original_text:
They have poured out their blood like water
    all around Jerusalem,
    and there was no one to bury them.
korean_text: 그들의 피를 예루살렘 사방에 물 같이 흘렸으나 그들을 매장하는 자가 없었나이다

sentences.original_text: They have poured out their blood like water
and there was no one to bury them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 묻어 줄 사람이 아무도 없었습니다.
